text: loko tamarathi candra vise savala kare che, tame kahi do ke a loko (nibandagi) no samaya ane hajjana divaso mate che, (eharama ni sthitimam) ane gharo na pachalathi tamaru avavum kami sadakarya nathi, parantu sadacari te che je daravavalo hoya ane gharomam to daravaja'o manthi avya karo, ane allahathi darata raho, jethi tame saphala tha'i java
